description:
Framework announced the Framework Desktop and Framework Laptop 12, along with an updated Framework Laptop 13. Here are the details!

The post Framework Announces Framework Desktop and 2-in-1 Framework Laptop 12 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Framework Announces Framework Desktop and 2-in-1 Framework Laptop 12
